text: in toil and hardship, in many sleepless nights, in hunger and thirst, in frequent fastings, in cold and nakednessWhen the Lord told Ananias to go and restore Saul's sight, and he protested, the Lord continued, “For I will show him how many things he must suffer for my name's sake” (Acts 9:16). Paul paid for what he did against the early Church. By the way, we usually have to pay for our misdeeds down here (how can you pay in Heaven?).—
